EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Quest End of Life Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Quest Customer: NCR is committed to providing the highest quality products and services to our customers. As part of our strategic processes, we continually assess our existing solution portfolio to ensure we are giving our customers a clear competitive advantage, new technology and product innovation and operational efficiencies. A key element to driving new innovation can be making the difficult decision to discontinue the availability and maintenance of products that have reached the end of their useful life. We previously announced the end-of-life date for Quest Venue Manager, Quest Suites Catering and Quest Suites Catering Online. This is a reminder that the end-of-life date is December 31, 2023. Customers will continue to receive support for this product until we reach that date. Shiji has also announced that the end-of-life <[[https://go.ncr.com/rs/605-BQY-740/images/Shiji - EFT Middleware EOL Announcement 103122 Reminder.pdf]]> for their credit processing product integrated with Quest is December 31, 2023. NCR has partnered with MyVenue who provides a POS and mobile commerce solution to venues like yours. While NCR will be providing full support to NCR Quest customers until the end of 2023, MyVenue has deep experience with the NCR Quest solution and is ready to offer a phased transition to their solution at your convenience. MyVenue is dedicated to the Stadium and Arena industry.
